name: Racing Champion In Desert
description:
Welcome to Racing Champion In Desert, Here is lots of vehicles and the whole desert to drive for. Take experience the thrilling crazy driving in the wide desert, the world’s most beautiful desert. Try your luck and become the legend among the legends the stunning desert jeep racing. Select your luxurious jeep from the list of various monsters jeeps. Fly the dirt in the eyes of your opponents. Enjoy the ups and downs of the lovely and beautiful desert racing. So get ready for your luxurious 4x4 vehicles in action.


Racing Champion In Desert: Features:

Nice smooth control
Awesome Desert environment
Multiple monster jeeps
Rally in the desert
Reach the checkpoints
Addictive game play
Crazy drifting
